backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the neon-tech theme update to specific frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of key frontend files and their roles in the neon-tech themed UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for the electric/neon tech color palette in light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the large 'Bytes console winning!' headline and a styled code input box with footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining electric neon color variables and smoothing settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap mounting React with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, radii, and animations using OKLCH theme variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing implemented features, theme update, and pending feature requests.
